original_text: Jesus knew that the Father had put all things under his power, and that he had come from God and was returning to God;
korean_text: 저녁 먹는 중 예수는 아버지께서 모든 것을 자기 손에 맡기신 것과 또 자기가 하나님께로부터 오셨다가 하나님께로 돌아가실 것을 아시고

sentences.original_text: Jesus knew that the Father had put all things
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 아버지께서 모든 것을 두셨다는 것을 아셨습니다

sentences.original_text: and that he had come from God
